article.title: Honeywell to Provide GPS Technologies
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Honeywell International Incorporated, Defense and Space Electronic Systems, Clearwater, Florida, is being awarded a $80,228,616.not-to-exceed firm-fixed-price to acquire Global Position System/Inertial Navigation System production units for the AH-64, AB3, UH-60, CH-47, SPN-46, E-2, and UH-1 platforms for the Army, Navy, and Foreign Military Sales requirements.Â Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
